intro: Puzzle and rhythm in a brand-new mix!
description:
"QQQbeats!!!" is a brand-new puzzle game that combines simple bubble shooting with easy-to-play rhythm game mechanics. Enjoy the excitement to the fullest by making the most of each character's unique personality!

■There are three playable modes!

There are three playable modes, so you can enjoy the game solo or with friends, both online and offline!

- STORY
This is the STORY mode, where you can play at your own pace by yourself.
Clearing stages unlocks new characters and songs.

- VERSUS
VERSUS mode lets you enjoy 1-on-1 competitive play.
You can play online in "Ranked Match," "Casual Match," or "Private Match."
There are also "Local Battles" and "Shared Battles" for offline play, as well as "COM Battles" where you can practice against the computer at your own pace.
Enjoy playing in your favorite style as much as you like!

- DUOps
DUOps is a cooperative play mode where you team up with friends to battle against enemies.
You can enjoy it casually both online and offline.
Clearing stages rewards you with even more in-game currency, "BeatCoin."


■ Featured Songs

A packed lineup featuring hit anime and pop songs, virtual singers, VTubers, Touhou arrangements, and more!
A total of 56 songs!

- Hai Yorokonde / Kocchi no Kento
- Show / Ado
- MIXED NUTS / OFFICIAL HIGE DANDISM
- Tell Your World / livetune feat. Hatsune Miku
- Mesmerizer / 32ki
- Charles / Balloon
- BIBBIDIBA / Hoshimachi Suisei
- Say! Fanfare! / Shirakami Fubuki
- HUGE W / Mori Calliope
- Bad Apple!! feat. nomico / Masayoshi Minoshima
- Night of Knights / Knight of Nights / beatMARIO(COOL&CREATE)
- Charismatic Purgatory Goddess / Shinra-Bansho
- Re：End of a Dream (long ver.) / uma vs. Morimori Atsushi
- Cheatreal / t+pazolite
- Big Daddy / USAO


■Collaborations with popular talents and characters have also been realized!

Popular talent and characters from virtual singers, Touhou Project, and VTubers make a sudden appearance!

Included in the base soft:
- Miku Hatsune
- Teto Kasane
- Reimu Hakurei
- Marisa Kirisame
- Shirakami Fubuki
- Mori Calliope

Now, let's start the game!
Let's beat!!
